summary: A ReDoS vulnerability (CVE-2022-25883) was detected in the semver dependency (version 7.5.0) used transitively through ts-loader. The issue was automatically closed as the vulnerable library is no longer part of the inventory.
userImpact: Users could experience denial of service if untrusted user data is provided as a semver range, potentially affecting availability.
rootCause: Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) in semver package versions before 7.5.2 when processing untrusted range data.
proposedFix: Upgrade semver to version 7.5.2 or later.
resolutionDetails: Issue was automatically closed by Mend as the vulnerable library was marked as ignored or removed from the Mend inventory.
keyQuote: Versions of the package semver before 7.5.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the function new Range
